name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: A business identifier assigned to a particular completed (or partially completed) questionnaire.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A business identifier assigned to a particular completed (or partially completed) questionnaire.

name: $basedOn
desc: Returns: The order, proposal or plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this QuestionnaireResponse.  For example, a ServiceRequest seeking an intake assessment or a decision support recommendation to assess for post-partum depression.

name: $addbasedOn
desc: The order, proposal or plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this QuestionnaireResponse.  For example, a ServiceRequest seeking an intake assessment or a decision support recommendation to assess for post-partum depression.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The order, proposal or plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this QuestionnaireResponse.  For example, a ServiceRequest seeking an intake assessment or a decision support recommendation to assess for post-partum depression.

name: $partOf
desc: Returns: A procedure or observation that this questionnaire was performed as part of the execution of.  For example, the surgery a checklist was executed as part of.

name: $addpartOf
desc: A procedure or observation that this questionnaire was performed as part of the execution of.  For example, the surgery a checklist was executed as part of.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A procedure or observation that this questionnaire was performed as part of the execution of.  For example, the surgery a checklist was executed as part of.

name: $questionnaire
desc: Returns: The Questionnaire that defines and organizes the questions for which answers are being provided.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The Questionnaire that defines and organizes the questions for which answers are being provided.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The position of the questionnaire response within its overall lifecycle.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The position of the questionnaire response within its overall lifecycle.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: The subject of the questionnaire response.  This could be a patient, organization, practitioner, device, etc.  This is who/what the answers apply to, but is not necessarily the source of information.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The subject of the questionnaire response.  This could be a patient, organization, practitioner, device, etc.  This is who/what the answers apply to, but is not necessarily the source of information.

name: $encounter
desc: Returns: The Encounter during which this questionnaire response was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The Encounter during which this questionnaire response was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

name: $authored
desc: Returns: The date and/or time that this set of answers were last changed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date and/or time that this set of answers were last changed.

name: $author
desc: Returns: Person who received the answers to the questions in the QuestionnaireResponse and recorded them in the system.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Person who received the answers to the questions in the QuestionnaireResponse and recorded them in the system.

name: $source
desc: Returns: The person who answered the questions about the subject.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The person who answered the questions about the subject.

name: $item
desc: Returns: A group or question item from the original questionnaire for which answers are provided.

name: $additem
desc: A group or question item from the original questionnaire for which answers are provided.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A group or question item from the original questionnaire for which answers are provided.
